variation: Manual distilling panel with dual SSR heater zones, PXU PID interface, manual mixer control, and float switch input

parts.description: Solid State Relays (SSR) per heater zone
.75 HP motor contactor, manual switch + LED
Dry contact sensor input for safety interlock

notes: No PLC or automation. Temperature is controlled via manual PID interface (Red Lion PXU), with operator toggle between auto/manual mode. Includes dual SSR heater zones, dry contact float switch input, and agitator control. Enclosure is rated Type 1, 5KA SCCR, built to UL508A.
